casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Wayne SHERRILL 246A09-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 26, 2019 M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Attorney at Law, John F. Carella, Staff Attorney, Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Sherrill, Michael Wayne. Clayton Jones, Assistant District Attorney, Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of April 2019 by State of NC for Extension of Time to Respond to Motion for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of April 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including 31 May 2019 to Respond to Motion for Appropriate Relief.
